mapper.insert: insert into borrow(bor_no, mno, b_no) values(#{bor_no}, #{mno}, #{b_no})
mapper.select: select count(*) from (select * from borrow where sysdate > return_date and return_ok='N' or return_ok='P') where mno=#{mno}
select sum(sysdate- return_date) from (select * from borrow where sysdate > return_date and return_ok='N' or return_ok='P') where mno=#{mno}
select count(b_no) from BORROW where b_no = #{b_no}
select count(*) from borrow where return_ok = 'N' and mno = #{mno}

SELECT * FROM (select rownum n, q.* from ( select distinct b.b_title, b.b_image, b.b_publisher, b.b_writer, b.b_price, b.b_detail, b.b_year, a.bor_no, a.b_no, a.bor_date, a.return_date, a.return_ok, a.mno from borrow a, book b where a.b_no = b.b_no and mno = #{mno} and bor_date is not null and (return_ok like 'N' or return_ok like 'P') order by bor_date desc ) q)
mapper.update: update borrow set return_ok='P' where bor_no=#{bor_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from borrow where mno = #{mno} and sysdate > return_date

SELECT * FROM (select rownum n, q.* from (select distinct b.b_title, b.b_image, b.b_publisher, b.b_writer, b.b_price, b.b_detail, b.b_year, a.bor_no, a.b_no, a.bor_date, a.return_date, a.return_ok, a.mno from borrow a, book b where a.b_no = b.b_no and mno = #{mno} and bor_date is not null and sysdate > return_date order by bor_date desc)q) where n between #{start} and #{end}
